languages.text: "Ах!.." {n}Кассия щурится и быстро отводит взгляд.{/n} "Желтый, красный, лиловый, оранжевый, синий... Дикие цвета, готовые выжечь глаза. Но там, где заканчиваются пестрые маски, остается лишь бесцветная пустота".
"Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."
languages.original_text: "Ах!.." {n}Кассия щурится и быстро отводит взгляд.{/n} "Желтый, красный, лиловый, оранжевый, синий... Дикие цвета, готовые выжечь глаза. Но там, где заканчиваются пестрые маски, остается лишь бесцветная пустота".

traits.locale_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that could burn one's eyes away. But where the mottled masks end, nothing but colourless void remains."

"Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that could burn one's eyes away. But where the mottled masks end, nothing but colourless void remains."

"Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."

languages.text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia kneift die Augen zu und wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Gelb, rot, violett, orange, blau ... Wilde Farben, die in den Augen brennen. Aber wo die Masken enden, bleibt nur farblose Leere."
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."

traits.locale_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia kneift die Augen zu und wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Gelb, rot, violett, orange, blau ... Wilde Farben, die in den Augen brennen. Aber wo die Masken enden, bleibt nur farblose Leere."

languages.text: « Ah ! » {n}Cassia plisse les yeux et détourne le regard.{/n} « Jaune, rouge, violet, orange, bleu... Des couleurs sauvages qui brûlent les yeux. Mais là où les masques bigarrés s'arrêtent, il ne reste qu'un néant incolore. »
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."

traits.locale_text: « Ah ! » {n}Cassia plisse les yeux et détourne le regard.{/n} « Jaune, rouge, violet, orange, bleu... Des couleurs sauvages qui brûlent les yeux. Mais là où les masques bigarrés s'arrêtent, il ne reste qu'un néant incolore. »

languages.text: “啊！”{n}卡西娅眯起了眼睛，赶紧移开了视线。{/n}“黄色、红色、紫色、橙色、蓝色……无数狂乱的色彩灼伤了我的双眼，但在那斑驳面具的尽头，只有无色的虚无。”
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."

traits.locale_text: “啊！”{n}卡西娅眯起了眼睛，赶紧移开了视线。{/n}“黄色、红色、紫色、橙色、蓝色……无数狂乱的色彩灼伤了我的双眼，但在那斑驳面具的尽头，只有无色的虚无。”

languages.text: 「ああ！」 {n}カシアは目を細め、遠くを見やる。{/n}「黄色、赤、紫、オレンジ、青…目を焦がす荒々しい色彩。でもまだらの覆いが終わる場所には、色のない虚無しか残りません」
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ！」 {n}カシアは目を細め、遠くを見やる。{/n}「黄色、赤、紫、オレンジ、青…目を焦がす荒々しい色彩。でもまだらの覆いが終わる場所には、色のない虚無しか残りません」

languages.text: «¡Ah!». {n}Cassia entorna los ojos y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Tonos amarillos, rojos, violetas, naranjas, azules... Colores salvajes que queman los ojos. Pero donde terminan las máscaras moteadas, solo queda un vacío descolorido».
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah!». {n}Cassia entorna los ojos y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Tonos amarillos, rojos, violetas, naranjas, azules... Colores salvajes que queman los ojos. Pero donde terminan las máscaras moteadas, solo queda un vacío descolorido».

languages.text: "Ha!" {n}Cassia gözlerini kısıp kaçırıyor.{/n} "Sarılar, kırmızılar, morlar, turuncular, maviler... Dizginsiz renkler, insanın gözünü dağlıyor. Ancak alacalı maske çıktığında geriye bir tek renksiz bir boşluk kalır."
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia squints and looks away.{/n} "Yellows, reds, violets, oranges, blues... Wild colours that scorch the eyes. But where the motley masks end, nothing but a colourless void remains."

traits.locale_text: "Ha!" {n}Cassia gözlerini kısıp kaçırıyor.{/n} "Sarılar, kırmızılar, morlar, turuncular, maviler... Renklerin canlılığı, insanın gözünü alıyor. Ancak alacalı maske çıktığında geride bir tek kapkara bir boşluk kalır."
